title: Forth Eorlingas! (4U275)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert Theoden to make a companion who has the Theoden signet defender +1 until the regroup phase.
Lore:	“Behind them from the Deep came the stern cries of men issuing from the caves, driving forth the enemy.'”
Rarity:	U
